title: Chidera Ezeh
text:
Chidera Kennedy Ezeh (born 2 October 1997) is a Nigerian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays in Portugal for the Under-23 squad of <a href="Portimonense%20S.C.">Portimonense</a>.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Segunda%20Liga">Segunda Liga</a> for <a href="Portimonense%20S.C.">Portimonense</a> on 20 November 2016 in a game against <a href="S.C.%20Braga%20B">Braga B</a>.
International.
He won the <a href="2013%20FIFA%20U-17%20World%20Cup">2013 FIFA U-17 World Cup</a> with Nigeria, scoring a goal in the semi-final game against Sweden.
